biography.bio: Fosco Giachetti was born on March 28, 1900 in Sesto Fiorentino, Tuscany, Italy. He was an actor, known for The Conformist (1970), Bengasi (1942) and The Siege of the Alcazar (1940). He died on December 22, 1974 in Rome, Lazio, Italy.
biography.name: Fosco Giachetti

biography.bio: Filippo Scelzo was born on April 19, 1900 in Ivrea, Piedmont, Italy. He was an actor and director, known for Odessa in fiamme (1942), Passaporto rosso (1935) and La bambolona (1968). He died on October 9, 1980 in Rome, Lazio, Italy.
biography.name: Filippo Scelzo

biography.bio: Carlo Duse was born on January 5, 1899 in Udine, Friuli-Venezia Giulia, Italy. He was an actor and writer, known for The Little World of Don Camillo (1952), Tredici uomini e un cannone (1939) and La grande luce - Montevergine (1939). He was married to Italia Vitaliani. He died on September 9, 1956 in Rome, Lazio, Italy.
biography.name: Carlo Duse

biography.bio: Carlo Romano was born on May 8, 1908 in Livorno, Tuscany, Italy. He is known for his work on I Vitelloni (1953), Le bonheur de Monsieur Rossi (1976) and Four Steps in the Clouds (1942). He was married to Jone Romano. He died on October 16, 1975 in Rome, Lazio, Italy.
biography.name: Carlo Romano

biography.bio: Mario Steni is an actor, known for Tredici uomini e un cannone (1939), The Blind Woman of Sorrento (1934) and The Magnificent Rogue (1935).
biography.name: Mario Steni

biography.bio: Enrico Marroni is an actor, known for Camicia nera (1933), Tredici uomini e un cannone (1939) and L'eredità dello zio (1935).
biography.name: Enrico Marroni

biography.bio: Piero Pastore was born on March 3, 1903 in Padua, Veneto, Italy. He was an actor, known for Acier (1933), Oro nero (1942) and Tredici uomini e un cannone (1939). He died on January 8, 1968 in Rome, Lazio, Italy.
biography.name: Piero Pastore

biography.bio: Fernando De Crucciati is an actor, known for Tredici uomini e un cannone (1939), The Blind Woman of Sorrento (1934) and Il treno delle 21,15 (1933).
biography.name: Fernando De Crucciati

biography.bio: Giuseppe Addobbati (Makarska, December 31, 1909 - Rome, Jan. 4, 1986) was an Italian actor, best known for his great qualities of character. He lives for a long time in Trieste, where he devoted himself to theater. In the film debuted during the Fascist period interpreting a discreet important role in "13 uomini e un cannone" of Joachim Forzano (1936). Until 1943 he is used in parts of a second or third floor in about twenty films. After a long silence reappears on the screens in 1951; in this decade he is a little active and works almost always hiding behind the pseudonym "John Douglas". In the sixties, on the contrary, his appearances multiply (over forty films), but rarely he has the opportunity to shine, accepting almost always of character roles in genre films. Since the seventies began a more careful selection to films to attend, with particular attention to the most acclaimed directors of the moment such as Bernardo Bertolucci's "Il conformista" for which he plays. Also he dusts off his old pseudonym, turning it into John McDouglas.
biography.name: Giuseppe Addobbati

biography.bio: Silvio Bagolini was born on August 4, 1914 in Bologna, Italy. He was an actor, known for I Vitelloni (1953), Variety Lights (1951) and The Overcoat (1952). He died on September 26, 1976 in Bologna, Emilia-Romagna, Italy.
biography.name: Silvio Bagolini

biography.bio: Valerio Gasparri is an actor, known for Tredici uomini e un cannone (1939).
biography.name: Valerio Gasparri

biography.bio: Edoardo Toniolo was born on November 22, 1907 in Turin, Piedmont, Italy. He is known for his work on Gladiators 7 (1962), Toto, Peppino, and the Hussy (1956) and Il professore (1967). He was married to Livia Geri. He died on December 31, 1986.
biography.name: Edoardo Toniolo

biography.bio: Egisto Olivieri was born on March 21, 1880 in Rome, Lazio, Italy. He was an actor, known for Frontier (1934), Luciano Serra, pilote (1938) and L'esclave blanc (1936). He died on March 4, 1962 in Bologna, Emilia-Romagna, Italy.
biography.name: Egisto Olivieri

biography.bio: Ernesto Sabbatini was born on September 8, 1878 in Padua, Veneto, Italy. He was an actor, known for Il trattato scomparso (1933), My Little One (1933) and Diane la mystérieuse (1916). He was married to Lena Adani and Giannina Chiantoni. He died on October 5, 1954 in Milan, Lombardy, Italy.
biography.name: Ernesto Sabbatini

biography.bio: Leo Chiostri is an actor, known for Tomb of the Angels (1937), Tredici uomini e un cannone (1939) and Les deux sergents (1936).
biography.name: Leo Chiostri
